title: Shopping: Clothing (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Clothing subcategory within Shopping. Includes 7 card(s).

cards.english: Where can I buy a kimono?
cards.romaji: Kimono wa doko de kaemasu ka?
cards.japanese: 着物はどこで買えますか？

cards.romaji: Watashi wa kimono ga suki desu.

cards.english: Where can I buy Japanese socks?
cards.japanese: 足袋はどこで買えますか？

cards.english: Where can I buy Japanese sandals?
cards.japanese: 草履はどこで買えますか？
白いドレスが欲しいです。
茶色いズボンを買いました。
